function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Travel anxiety increases with travel-related risks.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Health-related risks influence choice of destination and tourism provider.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fear of infectious diseases affects travel decisions and choice of destination.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 beliefs influence vacation plans.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Infectious diseases impact travel decisions and choice of destination.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The occurrence of the covid-19 pandemic has led to general fear.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Person-to-person transmission of covid-19","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Long incubation period of covid-19","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decrease in tourist arrivals due to virus outbreaks","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Epidemics and pandemics leading to public response and increased stress levels","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Anxiety as a response to stressful situations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Influences of risk perception on consumer behavior in tourism","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative influence of risk perception on travel intentions during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Influence of fear of covid-19 on travel intentions and behavior","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
